content.question:
Impact of grain scarcity

Subductissubduco, -ere: haul up navibus concilioque Gallorum SamarobrivaeSamarobriva, -ae, f.: Samarobriva, the capital city of the Ambiani peracto, quod eo anno frumentum in Gallia propter siccitatessiccitas, -atis, f.: drought angustiusanguste, adv.: narrowly provenerat, coactus est aliter acaliter ac: otherwise than, unlike superioribussuperior, -ius: previous annis exercitum in hibernis collocare legionesque in plures civitates distribuere.

Bellum Gallicum 5.24

Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
